tool_description: This API validates US addresses and also return closely matched addresses. See list of match codes from this API call here -> https://snapcx.readme.io/docs/avsv1validateaddress .
name: Address Validation and Correction
title: Address Validation and Correction

api_list.name: Address Validation by UberCX
api_list.description: This GET request will return JSON response with corrected addresses, as applicable. If no matching address found, then matchCode is AVS_03. If it is perfect match, then matchCode is AVS01. If it's partial match with other possibilities, then matchCode is AVS_02. See detailing listing here https://snapcx.readme.io/docs/avsv1validateaddress

required_parameters.name: request_id
required_parameters.description: Any random unique string. Response returns this string as part of response. It helps in identifying unique requests.

optional_parameters.name: zipcode
optional_parameters.description: 5 Digit zipcode of US Address. If either of city or state is missing, then this parameter is required.
